name: You reap what it sows
description:
A small text-based narrative game.

You have a new plant and it bears delicious fruit!

Delicious indeed...!

Played only with the mouse.

First Ludum dare and made solo! However, be harsh if you deem it necessary!

Wish I had time to put more details but the game is complete!

Made all the visuals, code, sounds and music by myself, at the exception of the police which is Hackbot.

"Art" made with Asesprite, music with Bosca Ceoil.
